action.name: Execute
action.command: xlsatoms | gxmessage -name xlsatoms -geometry 400x400 -font 'Liberation Mono 8' -title 'X Display Atoms' -file -

action.name: Execute
action.command: xlsclients -a -l | gxmessage -name xlsclients -geometry 400x400 'Liberation Mono 8' -title 'X Display Clients' -file -

action.name: Execute
action.command: xmodmap|gxmessage -name xmodmap -font 'Liberation Mono 8' -title 'X Mod Key Information' -file -
